content: This current batch of fucking politicians should be lined up in the streets and put down. Fuck these low life assholes who clearly want nothing more than to rape and pillage the poor, women and everyone else who is not them; all just to make the rich richer. FUCK YOU TRUMP, FUCK YOU RYAN and FUCK any human being who supports this so called health care act. I truly hope you all get what you deserve. The American people certainly deserve better than you all.
